# baseLeaderboardID

**Instance Property**

The ID that Game Center uses to identify this leaderboard.

## Declaration

```swift
var baseLeaderboardID: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the same ID that App Store Connect uses to identify this leaderboard.

## Accessing Identifier and Type Properties

- **title**: The localized title for the leaderboard.
- **type**: The type of leaderboard, classic or recurring.
- **GKLeaderboard.LeaderboardType**: Specifies whether a leaderboard is recurring.
- **groupIdentifier**: The identifier for the group the leaderboard belongs to.
